mapper.select: SELECT warehouse_sn,warehouse_real,warehouse_surface,warehouse_time,supplier_spec,goods_unit,goods_name,goods_sn FROM tl_erp_warehouse,tl_erp_supplier s WHERE supplier_id = s.id

SELECT c.id, c.car_order_sn,c.car_order_pickdate,p.pickgoods_car_sn,s.goods_name,s.goods_sn,s.supplier_spec,u.user_company_name,p.pickgoods_send_company,p.pickgoods_num,s.goods_price,c.car_order_address FROM tl_erp_supplier s,tl_erp_car_order c,tl_erp_pickgoods p,tl_erp_user u WHERE u.id = s.`user_id` AND s.`id` = p.`supplier_id`

SELECT w.warehouse_real, w.warehouse_surface, s.goods_sn AS goods_sn, s.goods_name AS goods_name, s.supplier_spec AS supplier_spec, s.goods_unit AS goods_unit FROM tl_erp_warehouse w, tl_erp_supplier s WHERE w.`supplier_id` = s.`id`
